title: Sprite and Giant Jet Energetics: SR → VAM → SST
description:
This paper examines the energetics of transient luminous events (sprites and giant jets) through a systematic mapping from special relativity (SR) to the Vortex Æther Model (VAM) and then to the canonical Swirl--String Theory (SST). 
We show that the SR rest--kinetic decomposition re-emerges in VAM with \( c -> v_\circlearrowleft \), and that the same structure has a natural translation into SST via the Swirl Clock formalism. 
The goal is to provide a coherent physical and mathematical account of excitation (giant jets) and relaxation (sprites) as macroscopic analogues of quantum transitions.
